As a new customer using

You can also use AWS SSO's identity store

If you choose to use

to use configurable
synchronization for AD,

which is a synchronization
mechanism that AWS SSO provides

to AD customers for
provisioning identities
from AD into AWS SSO.
These identities can then be used

for assigning access to AWS
accounts or applications.
With configurable synchronization for AD,

you can synchronize users
and groups consistent
with your data sovereignty requirements.
You can add or remove users and groups

to change the scope of
the sync at any time.
Assign and synchronize users and groups

by pausing and resuming
the sync as needed.
